high_priority.title: Refine Gemini Prompting
high_priority.desc: Optimize the diagnostic prompt for better car-specific reasoning and character count constraints.

high_priority.title: Dynamic Pricing Engine
high_priority.desc: Implement CAR_TYPE_BASE_PRICES logic to scale based on vehicle chassis dimensions.

high_priority.title: Secure Payment Integration
high_priority.desc: Replace simulated checkout with a real Stripe/PayPal gateway implementation.

medium_priority.title: Mobile Unit Geolocation
medium_priority.desc: Use browser geolocation API to verify if the user is within the 50km mobile service radius.

medium_priority.title: Multi-Speaker TTS
medium_priority.desc: Add a professional 'Voice Greeting' on the confirmation page using Gemini TTS.

low_priority.title: Loyalty Token Program
low_priority.desc: Implement a 'Glow Points' system where users earn credits for recurring bookings.
